name: Survival Sprint
description:
How to play

Choose and match different weapons and supportive items to resist enemy attacks. Your goal is to do your best to survive!
Also, use your unique active skills when necessary!
(Tips: Some collocations will have unexpected effects!)

Game Features

  • There are more than 20 different weapons and supportive items.
  • Multiple characters and different active skills.
  • 14 different character upgrades.
  • More than 10 different monsters.
  • 4 kinds of bosses with their own characteristics.
  • Good music(?).
  • and more...

PS. This game is only developed by one person (Me). Therefore, development progress may be a little slow. I welcome your comments!
